Body: Description: We are not using DLP nor do we have that kind of license, we are only using EPP for USB device control.  We have noticed that Outlook is installing an EPP plugin... and that users are complaining Outlook says this plugin is causing Outlook to load slowly.  Can we simply disable EPP from putting this plugin into outlook?  We can't find anything in the documentation.
What We've Learned Updated: We have explained how the Outlook Add-on is being installed along with the Epp agent and that it can be disabled/removed from the Outlook settings.
Next Steps Updated: Waiting for the customer's feedback.
